column4: Greetings! Question: v 9.10. Auto login - works fine from boot. However if I log off I expect it auto login again. It does not - I just get a login screen. Is it possible to force it to auto login always?
Did so. Activated auto logon. It works from boot. But if I log off a session it does not then auto logon.
I used to have this configuration, I just cant remember how I got there
